pkgmetadata.longdescription: 'NASA' 'POWER' 'API' Client // Client for 'NASA' 'POWER' global meteorology, surface solar energy and climatology data 'API'. 'POWER' (Prediction Of Worldwide Energy Resource) data are freely available global meteorology and surface solar energy climatology data for download with a resolution of 0.5 by 0.5 arc degree longitude and latitude and are funded through the 'NASA' Earth Science Directorate Applied Science Program. For more on the data themselves and a web-based data viewer and access, please see https://power.larc.nasa.gov/.
